long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tackboard replaces your new tab page with a board of sticky notes. 

Create notes, edit them, drag them around, or minimize to keep track of thoughts and organize your brain. 

Features:
 - Text Formatting (Bold, italic, underline, headings, links, etc.)
 - Blur background notes to focus
 - Minimize notes to free up space
 - Color-code notes or just make them look pretty
 - Dark Mode
